sentences.english: Bearings allow the shaft to turn while permitting the housing to remain still.
sentences.chinese: 轴承允许传动轴转动的同时允许壳体保持静止。

sentences.english: Captured with black and white film, her photography emulates the style of a cinematographer.
sentences.chinese: 黑白胶片同时也模拟着舞台人生。

sentences.english: He was also a reckless adventurer who got lucky.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也是一位轻率鲁莽而运气十足的冒险家。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, there are more than 70 Chinese-funded businesses in Brazil and 300 Brazilian-funded businesses in China.
sentences.chinese: 同时，中国在巴西投资兴建了70多家企业。

sentences.english: It also reflects the pantheistic experimentation of the period immediately following the Civil War.
sentences.chinese: 同时也反映出了泛神论时期紧跟的内战时期状态。

sentences.english: At the same time, the use of coal exhaustive method to optimize selection.
sentences.chinese: 同时利用穷举法对配煤进行优化选取。

sentences.english: At the same time, Shafei has the devil character to save herself .
sentences.chinese: 同时，莎菲又有自救反抗的魔性。

sentences.english: The volatile substance contained a little of sesquiterpenes and diterpenoids.
sentences.chinese: 同时含有少量倍半萜和二萜类物质。

sentences.english: While she could be strict, she could also be a real “softie.
sentences.chinese: 她既有严厉的一面，同时也真的是一个感性的人。

sentences.english: He also became embroiled in controversy surrounding the government bail-out of Chrysler.
sentences.chinese: 同时他也因政府保释克莱斯勒而被卷入巨大争议。

sentences.english: The clever thing was to break the rules and stay alive all the same .
sentences.chinese: 聪明的做法，是把规矩破得巧，同时又得活得好。

sentences.english: So, apps such as Pandora internet radio can be listened to while reading the news using another app.
sentences.chinese: 例如你在阅读新闻的时候同时收听潘朵拉网络广播。

sentences.english: Unemployment and unfilled vacancies can exist side by side .
sentences.chinese: 失业和未填补的空额可以同时并存。

sentences.english: The effect of atomizing is better and burning is more full by improving nozzle structure inside and outside.
sentences.chinese: 同时改进烧嘴结构，使雾化效果更好，燃烧更加完全。

sentences.english: The equipartition law of energy is also briefly demonstrated.
sentences.chinese: 同时，对能均分原理也作了简洁的论证。

sentences.english: The loss of tin in the sulphide copper concentrate was less than 4%.
sentences.chinese: 同时锡在铜精矿中的损失也不到4%。

definition: and/furthermore/also/together with/(not) at all/simultaneously/to combine/to join/to merge
to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
of/~'s (possessive particle)/(used after an attribute)/(used to form a nominal expression)/(used at the end of a declarative sentence for emphasis)
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
and/as well as/and so/but (not)/yet (not)/(indicates causal relation)/(indicates change of state)/(indicates contrast)
apart from this/in addition to this
